bike.description: A2-SL alloy w/ PowerCurve down tube, hydroformed top tube, and semi-integrated tapered head tube, double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: A2-SL alloy w/ A-style seat stays and dropouts, cold forged dropout w/ CNC'D post disc mount and replaceable hanger

components.description: RockShox Recon Silver TK Coil tapered alloy steerer w/ PopLoc remote lockout, 100mm travel
Wellgo ATB w/ steel cage w/ toe clips and straps
Shimano Deore XT SGS Shadow top normal, 10-speed
Fuji 32H mountain disc hubs, Alex DP17 rims
Continental Race King 26x2.2" or Hutchinson Cougar Air Light 26x2.2"
Tektro Auriga Pro hydraulic disc w/ 180/160mm rotors
Oval M200 alloy riser bar, 15mm rise, 9Â° sweep,  31.8mm, 680mm wide
Oval M200 alloy reverse bolt technology, 31.8mm
